ISSUE.TITLE: Bibtex import does not parse multiple authors into different fields
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Description** In the DSpace 7 demo area I wanted to import a Bibtex file from the MyDSpace area. However, the authors were not parsed separately, but as one big block. **Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Get a bibtex file with multiple authors 2. Go to MyDSpace 3. Select the bibtex file to import 4.
